901f12b8-f353-470e-b2bd-bda0bc341c2c.name: Burrower
901f12b8-f353-470e-b2bd-bda0bc341c2c.notes: You can dig as if you had a shovel.

7df455a2-1aef-42fe-87f2-051323d4a5c8.name: Climbing Line
7df455a2-1aef-42fe-87f2-051323d4a5c8.notes: You can generate a climbing line at will.

4d566947-2ea4-47ed-b793-9ec1f0e1acc6.name: Cloaked
4d566947-2ea4-47ed-b793-9ec1f0e1acc6.notes: Your cloak doesn't snag, tangle, or provide your opponents with something to grab.

7c9fdfa7-7377-4632-bc9b-afd9f122e83a.name: Equipment Bond
7c9fdfa7-7377-4632-bc9b-afd9f122e83a.notes: You have a tool particularly suited to you for +1 to skill rolls using it.

387a8ef9-2a53-4709-96c6-e9c0ea75c95a.name: Forgetful
387a8ef9-2a53-4709-96c6-e9c0ea75c95a.notes: You often forget about your powers and equipment.

e010261d-589e-4f48-b3bd-53dcc44da9c7.name: Generator
e010261d-589e-4f48-b3bd-53dcc44da9c7.notes: You can produce a steady direct current.  Maximum: @Power@ Watts

c06e2f8a-82d4-422f-98ac-5f0a1d270196.name: Ignition
c06e2f8a-82d4-422f-98ac-5f0a1d270196.notes: You can ignite Highly Flammable or Super Flammable material.

634690a5-38e2-4905-b9ee-27ad7a97a121.name: Illumination
634690a5-38e2-4905-b9ee-27ad7a97a121.notes: You can produce light as if you had a flashlight.

d678d9b9-2915-4bcd-ba92-86fd33565c67.name: Masked
d678d9b9-2915-4bcd-ba92-86fd33565c67.notes: A domino mask, glasses, or similar disguise renders you totally unrecognizable to even your closest friends.

ce670dbc-e207-49c2-b834-765ac12c42e8.name: Nonprotective Clothing
ce670dbc-e207-49c2-b834-765ac12c42e8.notes: You can wear clothing other than armor.

6af97658-5af6-4d26-8df3-74de79dd529e.name: Perfume
6af97658-5af6-4d26-8df3-74de79dd529e.notes: +1 to reactions where smell makes a difference.

d5cb5875-dbce-4c7b-aa5b-23d45bebdcd3.name: Periscope
d5cb5875-dbce-4c7b-aa5b-23d45bebdcd3.notes: Can't see directly ahead and must take aim maneuvers while using.

2a4848e1-76a5-4391-9cd8-301a8dfc40f0.name: Skintight
2a4848e1-76a5-4391-9cd8-301a8dfc40f0.notes: Your costume can be worn under normal clothing without showing.

bc0a3000-2966-4d63-b9c6-a8bc66f7a4e3.name: Striking Surface
bc0a3000-2966-4d63-b9c6-a8bc66f7a4e3.notes: Punch and kick as if you had brass knuckles and boots.

d32a672a-e16d-4303-81a9-c5c4214a5d48.name: Supersuit
d32a672a-e16d-4303-81a9-c5c4214a5d48.notes: Your costume works with and is not harmed by your powers.

a2189128-c78d-4581-bf37-7522ee0fded3.name: Swinging
a2189128-c78d-4581-bf37-7522ee0fded3.notes: Swing from vines, grappling lines, or the like without needing skill rolls.

d2f00ce6-fbf1-4200-9696-43908f790316.name: Third Person
d2f00ce6-fbf1-4200-9696-43908f790316.notes: You always refer to yourself by name.
